response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product not only stands as a testament to quality but also offers unparalleled functionality that could significantly enhance your experience. Given its exceptional features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $8,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at $10,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for someone like you who appreciates the value of premium products. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
